xwikidoc.name: ccmArchive20130424
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 24 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 02:46 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 03:38 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 06:41 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 06:48 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 07:17 <UCC> has joined #ccm 07:43 <qiangkou> has joined #ccm 08:25 <qwebirc48553> has joined #ccm 08:27 <qwebirc48553> hi guys , iwould like to participate in gsoc 13 . whom can i consult ? 09:03 <UCC> has joined #ccm 09:43 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:37 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 11:08 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu1 11:15 <sdumitriu1> Hey kushalkhandelwal 11:38 <UCC> has joined #ccm 12:15 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:39 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:42 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:47 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:51 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:52 <froggy> has joined #ccm 12:55 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:59 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:03 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:07 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:11 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:15 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:19 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:23 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:25 <qwebirc52220> has joined #ccm 13:27 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:31 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:31 <qwebirc52220> hi there 13:32 <sdumitriu1> Hi qwebirc52220 13:33 <qwebirc52220> i would like to contribute to ccm under gsoc, but i can't decide which idea to choose 13:34 <sdumitriu1> Well, what skills do you have, and what do you like doing 13:34 <qwebirc52220> can u tell which ones are of higher priority to your organisation?? 13:34 <sdumitriu1> "Automatic layout for the pedigree editor" is very important 13:35 <qwebirc52220> i m versed with data structures, algorithms and graph theory 13:35 <sdumitriu1> "Expansion of the SafeHeart App" too 13:35 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:35 <qwebirc52220> plus java, java-script,pyjton and c languages 13:38 <qwebirc52220> sdmitriu1>> thank you sir for your reply..... 13:39 <sdumitriu1> Look into the pedigree layout project then 13:39 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:39 <sdumitriu1> It requires algorithms, graphs, and JavaScript 13:41 <qwebirc52220> sir can you guide me to any documentation or any other source please...... 13:42 <qwebirc52220> from the description given i can't get a full understanding of what a pedigree editor does? 13:43 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:45 <sdumitriu1> qwebirc52220: http://phenotips.org/edit/data/P0000004?sheet=PhenoTips.PedigreeEditor# 13:47 <qwebirc52220> thank you sir, i am now studying this tool ... 13:48 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:52 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:56 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:59 <qwebirc52220> sir, from what i observed , that when i click on a node, new node is not formed, so is that what you mean by " interactively adjusting the layout to fit live updates to the pedigree." in the idea description?? 13:59 <qwebirc52220> and "build a new layout from scratch"... 14:01 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:02 <sdumitriu1> New nodes are added 14:02 <sdumitriu1> But not when you click on a node 14:02 <qwebirc52220> @sdumitriu1 >> sir please reply 14:02 <sdumitriu1> You have to click on the small dots 14:04 <qwebirc52220> the small blue dots dont seem to work! 14:06 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:10 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:12 <qwebirc52220> plus i think the layout needs redesign completely 14:12 <qwebirc52220> one one male of one female cant have children...... 14:13 <qwebirc52220> each node needs to store two entries- one for husband , other for wife! 14:14 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:16 <qwebirc52220> anyone there?? 14:16 <qwebirc52220> sdmitriu1 sir u there?? 14:18 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:22 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:23 <prateek12592> has joined #ccm 14:23 <prateek12592> hey there..... 14:25 <sdumitriu1> Hey prateek12592 14:25 <prateek12592> i was wondering to work on -" automatic layout for pedigree editor"... 14:26 <prateek12592> hey sdumitriu1 14:26 <prateek12592> are you a mentor for this project?? 14:27 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:28 <prateek12592> can you give your mail id? 14:29 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:29 <sdumitriu1> You should send emails to ccm-mentors@cs.toronto.edu 14:31 <prateek12592> okay........ plus is there any source code or wiki available for pedigree editor, so i can produce some code....... 14:31 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/tree/master/pedigree 14:33 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:37 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:41 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:45 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:49 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:50 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 14:53 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:57 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 14:58 <qwebirc161400> has joined #ccm 14:59 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:01 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 15:07 <mehitabel> has left #ccm 16:58 <BFlavien> has joined #ccm 16:58 <BFlavien> Hello everybody :) 16:58 <sdumitriu1> Hi 16:58 <BFlavien> I want to start by apologizing for my bad english skills, i'm french, but i hope being understandable 16:59 <sdumitriu1> Don't worry 16:59 <BFlavien> I'm a student who is very interested in the google summer of code 17:00 <BFlavien> And some of your project really interested me, so here i come to chat 17:01 <sdumitriu1> Very good 17:02 <BFlavien> I'm strongly interested by the Mobile UI for the Pedigree tool and Mobile Web interface for PhenoTips projects (maybe more the Web than the Mobile) 17:03 <sdumitriu1> They're both web and mobile 17:04 <sdumitriu1> Meaning that we're looking for a web interface that works well on mobiles 17:04 <sdumitriu1> Not a mobile native application 17:04 <UCC> has joined #ccm 17:04 <BFlavien> Yes, my bad, I mean i prefer Mobile Web interface for PhenoTips projects than Mobile UI for the Pedigree tool but just a little bit 17:08 <BFlavien> You wanted just a mobile web interface, or a "responsive" one working on every screen sizes? 17:08 <sdumitriu1> Responsive 17:09 <sdumitriu1> So the same URL should work well on any device 17:09 <BFlavien> Yep media queries 17:10 <BFlavien> Do you have a lot of student interrested by? 17:14 <sdumitriu1> In this one, not many 17:16 <BFlavien> And could you tell me what student profile you want, in order to see if i can hope send you an application? 17:17 <sdumitriu1> It's written in the details of every project 17:17 <sdumitriu1> For https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Mobile+Web+interface+for+PhenoTips it's: 17:17 <sdumitriu1> Required skills: JavaScript + experience with any popular JS library, HTML, CSS. 17:17 <sdumitriu1> Nice to have: Experience with mobile development, responsive design, jQuery Mobile. 17:19 <BFlavien> Yes of course, I already read this, but for example, I already make some little things with JS, and JQuery, but i can't tell i've a lot of "experience" 17:20 <BFlavien> Then if you tell me you just need an very experienced JS programmer, I fear to be not as good as required 17:22 <sdumitriu1> There is some JS required, but I don't think you need to be an expert for this one 17:22 <sdumitriu1> You will have to adapt a few widgets to work a bit differently on a smaller screen 17:23 <sdumitriu1> The Pedigree project is a bit harder on this aspect, since it's mostly JS code 17:24 <BFlavien> Is there a way to see an image or the page the project want to adapt ? 17:25 <sdumitriu1> phenotips.org 17:25 <sdumitriu1> Click on Demo 17:26 <BFlavien> Thank you ! 17:30 <BFlavien> I've a strange question, but what must a student do in order to convince you to be the one you want? 17:30 <sdumitriu1> Be active on IRC, try to get a few pull request done, and have a decent GSoC application 17:32 <BFlavien> May i ask you what you mean by a decent GSoC application? 17:33 <sdumitriu1> Well, we have the template that you're supposed to use 17:34 <sdumitriu1> Every question should have a good answer 17:35 <sdumitriu1> The ones that need more details are the architecture and timeline 17:35 <sdumitriu1> So we want to see that you did come up with a serious plan for the project 17:36 <BFlavien> Yes I understand 17:36 <sdumitriu1> I have to go, I'll be back in a few minutes 17:41 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 17:46 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 17:51 <sdumitriu1> Hey camelia_ 17:52 <BFlavien> I've a new question, I'm looking the bucktrackr, and I want to ask you if there is a ticket in particular, as your point of view, which could be a good way to you for testing me ? 17:52 <sdumitriu1> Well, most of the easy issue have just been fixed 17:52 <sdumitriu1> We'll post new ones soon 17:53 <BFlavien> I'm really sorry for asking you this kind of question, but it's the first time I looking for contributing in a big sized project 17:53 <sdumitriu1> Don't worry 17:54 <BFlavien> It's just I don't want to disappoint you by not doing what you expect 18:01 <sdumitriu1> Leaving again, back in 15 18:01 <BFlavien> Ok :) 18:27 <sdumitriu> Back 18:29 <BFlavien> I just have a little question, Have you already a mockup, or things like that for the mobile version? 18:30 <sdumitriu> Marta was working on that 18:31 <BFlavien> Ok 18:37 <BFlavien> I will not annoy you any longer, I will try to enter in the code, and trying to help if I can by resolving some things in the bugtracker 18:38 <BFlavien> Thank you very much for your patience and your kindness with me 18:38 <BFlavien> And I apologize again, and never enough, for reading my bad English sentences 18:49 <BFlavien> has left #ccm 21:35 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 22:04 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 22:08 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 22:08 <froggy> has joined #ccm
